Create a 2/2 blue Illusion creature token with “When this creature dies, choose target card in a graveyard. Its owner shuffles it into their library”.
[i]Otherworld[/i] – As long as an opponent has been burdened three or more times and this card is in your graveyard, it has flashback {2}{B} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
